TopicTitle: adding actions to KAL-1000 controller in flight

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm trying to build a rotating space station with the new breaking ground expansion. But have some trouble setting up the rotation. I am using servos instead of rotors because I haven't unlocked those yet.

In flight we can easily (and accidentally) delete the actions that are set up in the KAL controller, but there seems to be no way to undo that deletion (that's very easy to do accidentally). And there is also no way to put actions into the KAL controller in flight? Am I missing something important?

5 hours ago, kedrednael said:

In flight we can easily (and accidentally) delete the actions that are set up in the KAL controller, but there seems to be no way to undo that deletion (that's very easy to do accidentally). And there is also no way to put actions into the KAL controller in flight? Am I missing something important?

Adding a part's action to a KAL1000 can only be done through the Action Group editor, which is only available in the VAB/SPH..... UNLESS you have a mod like Action Groups Extended, which allows editing Action Groups in flight.

11 hours ago, Geschosskopf said:

Ok thanks!
Let's hope it get's added in the base game as well :).
